channel.title: What I'm going with a satellite dish!
channel.description:
I was out getting the mail one day when I saw perfectly good satellite dish just laying in my neighbors garbage. I quickly grabbed it and put it in my garage. I have already started work on modifying it so that it works with my wireless card. Here is how it's going to work.
1. Attach a device that makes the 2 coax wires that come out of the dish into into one. 2. Hook it up to my wireless card. 3. Modify my wireless with few volts for a stronger signal. 4. Write a program that leeches my neighbors internet into on giant network for fastest connection. 5. Enjoy.
Tell me what you think will happen :P. No flaming please.

item.title: What I'm going with a satellite dish!
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

rjop455:

Well I don’t know it if the dish itself will work ,but the addition of power will make my signal stronger.

Why not just hack NASA’s sattelites and you’ll get the greatest speed of all!!111

Read full topic
item.source: What I'm going with a satellite dish!

I remember reading that you could send a signal from one Dish to another to make a wireless network over distance.

item.title: What I'm going with a satellite dish!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It won’t work because a satellite dish does not work the same way an antennae does, but go ahead and try it anyway, it won’t hurt anything.
